http://www.mulesoft.org/schema/mule/db/select
select count(*) emailsFound from client where email=#[message.outboundProperties['email']]
http://www.mulesoft.org/schema/mule/db/execute-ddl
http://www.mulesoft.org/schema/mule/db/update
update client set validated=1 where email = #[message.inboundProperties['email']]
update client set validated=1 where email='#[message.inboundProperties['email']'
update client set validated=1 where email=#[message.inboundProperties['email']]
update client set validated=1 where email='#[message.inboundProperties['email']]'
http://www.mulesoft.org/schema/mule/db/insert
INSERT INTO highlight (content, news_id) SELECT * FROM (SELECT #[payload.getText()], n.id) FROM news n WHERE news n.url=#[message.outboundProperties.url]
INSERT INTO highlight (content, news_id) SELECT #[payload.getText()], n.id FROM news n WHERE news n.url=#[sessionVars.url]

INSERT IGNORE INTO news ( content, title, url, author_id, topic_id) SELECT #[message.outboundProperties.content],#[message.outboundProperties.title], #[message.outboundProperties.url], a.id, t.id FROM author a, topic t WHERE a.name = #[xpath('//author').text] AND t.name=#[sessionVars.topicName]

INSERT INTO news ( content, date, title, url, author_id, topic_id) SELECT content, date, title, url, a.author_id, t.topic_id FROM table1 p INNER JOIN auhtor c ON c.name = #[xpath('//author').text] INNER JOIN table3 n ON n.Id = p.Id

INSERT INTO highlight (content, news_id) SELECT * FROM (SELECT #[payload.getText()], n.id FROM news n WHERE n.url=#[sessionVars.url]) WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT content FROM highlight h, news n WHERE h.content = #[payload.getText()] AND n.url=#[sessionVars.url] AND n.id=h.id ) LIMIT 1;

INSERT INTO highlight (content, news_id) SELECT * FROM (SELECT #[payload.getText()], n.id FROM news n WHERE n.url=#[sessionVars.url]) WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT content FROM news_id WHERE content = #[payload.getText()] AND ) LIMIT 1;

INSERT INTO highlight (content, news_id) SELECT * FROM (SELECT #[payload.getText()], n.id FROM news n WHERE n.url=#[sessionVars.url]) WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT h.content h.id FROM highlight h, news n WHERE h.content = #[payload.getText()] AND n.url=#[sessionVars.url] AND n.id=h.id ) LIMIT 1;

INSERT IGNORE INTO news ( content, title, url, author_id, topic_id) SELECT #[message.outboundProperties.content],#[message.outboundProperties.title], #[message.outboundProperties.url], a.id, t.id FROM author a, topic t WHERE a.name = #[message.outboundProperties.author] AND t.name=#[sessionVars.topicName]

INSERT INTO table3 ( name, age, sex, city, id, number, nationality) SELECT name, age, sex, city, p.id, number, n.nationality FROM table1 p INNER JOIN table2 c ON c.Id = p.Id INNER JOIN table3 n ON n.Id = p.Id
INSERT INTO Client (subscription, email, validated,region) values (0, #[message.outboundProperties['http.query.params']['email']],0,0)
INSERT IGNORE INTO author (name) VALUES ()
INSERT IGNORE INTO author (name) VALUES (#[xpath('//author').toString()])

INSERT INTO news ( content, date, title, url, author_id, topic_id) SELECT content, date, title, url, a.author_id, t.topic_id FROM table1 p INNER JOIN auhtor c ON c.name = [] INNER JOIN table3 n ON n.Id = p.Id
INSERT INTO photo

INSERT IGNORE INTO news ( content, title, url, date, author_id, topic_id) SELECT #[message.outboundProperties.content],#[message.outboundProperties.title], #[message.outboundProperties.url],#[message.outboundProperties.date], a.id, t.id FROM author a, topic t WHERE a.name = #[message.outboundProperties.author] AND t.name=#[message.outboundProperties.topic]
INSERT INTO Client (subscription, email, validated,region) values (0, #[message.inboundProperties['email']],0,0)

INSERT INTO news ( content, date, title, url, author_id, topic_id) SELECT content, date, title, url, a.author_id, t.topic_id FROM table1 p INNER JOIN auhtor c ON c.name = #[xpath('//author').text] INNER JOIN topic t ON t.name=#[sessionVars.topicName]
INSERT INTO highlight (content, news_id) SELECT * FROM (SELECT 'content', n.id) FROM news n WHERE news n.url=#[message.outboundProperties.url]

INSERT IGNORE INTO author (name) VALUES (#[xpath('//title').text])

INSERT IGNORE INTO news ( content, title, url, date, author_id, topic_id) SELECT #[message.outboundProperties.content],#[message.outboundProperties.title], #[message.outboundProperties.url],#[message.outboundProperties.date], a.id, t.id FROM author a, topic t WHERE a.name = #[message.outboundProperties.author] AND t.name=#[sessionVars.topicName]
INSERT INTO author (name, email, validated,region) values (0, #[message.outboundProperties['http.query.params']['email']],0,0)
INSERT INTO highlight (content, news_id) SELECT #[payload.getText()], n.id FROM news n WHERE news n.url=#[message.outboundProperties.url]

INSERT IGNORE INTO news ( content, title, url, author_id, topic_id) SELECT #[xpath('//content').text], #[xpath('//title').text], #[xpath('//url').text], a.id, t.id FROM author a, topic t WHERE a.name = #[xpath('//author').text] AND t.name=#[sessionVars.topicName]
